title: This Tech Could INCREASE FPS for Gaming Notebooks...But Does It?
tags: how to increase notebook battery life
description: There's a lot of gaming notebook technology which claims to optimize performance but it rarely works.   After getting the Gigabyte Aero 15, there was one thing we wanted to test but it didn't make it into the review:   the use of Microsoft Azure AI to supposedly increase gaming performance.  In doing so it also boosts performance in other apps and gets better battery life too.  But does it actually work as advertised?  Well lets find out!
